content.question:
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->

Respond to all parts of the question:

(a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for the extent of censorship of the media in China. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about how censorship of the media impacts political culture in China.

(c) Explain why government censorship of the media in China differs from government censorship of the media in Mexico.
